response.job_title: Web Developer | Front End | Back End | JavaScript | React | TypeScript | Node JS | ExpressJS | HTML | CSS | Python | Flask | SQL | MongoDB | AWS | Scrum
response.summary: Bilingual Mechanical Engineer (English B2) with knowledge and experience in programming, web development (full stack), integration of services and APIs, relational and non-relational database design, unit and integration testing, performance testing for web pages and mobile web applications, exception and error handling, user interface development, deployment of applications in AWS environment, and data analysis. Proficient in technologies such as JavaScript, React, TypeScript, HTML, CSS, NodeJS, Python, Flask, ExpressJS, SQL, MongoDB, AWS, Blazemeter, Octoperf, SiteSpeedIO, JMeter, Cognos, Excel, and agile methodologies like SCRUM. Result-oriented individual with strong analytical, organizational, teamwork, leadership, and innovation skills. Seeking further growth opportunities in the development field.
response.skills: AngularJS, desarrollador web, Desarrollo front end, Desarrollo web back end, JavaScript, Scrum, Express.js, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Bases de datos, Docker, HTML, JMeter, Blazemeter, Octoperf, SitespeedIO, Pyhton, Jenkins, Dynatrace, Testing

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities: 
- Automated multiple processes using Python libraries (Pandas, NumPy, among others) to ensure report unification and reduction in operation time. 
- Generated reports for the development team by identifying errors and potential flaws in the features using cloud tools like Blazemeter and Octoperf, as well as local tools like JMeter. 
- Identified and analyzed recurrent paths on the website to automate solutions for the identified paths.

Achievements: 
- Effectively resolved an average of 150 issues, ensuring effective solutions and deployment of web pages.
 - Automated two operation processes, reducing the designated time from 30 minutes to zero. 
- Successfully migrated multiple scripts from Blazemeter to Octoperf, resulting in a budget reduction of $20,000.
profile_positions.title: Performance Test Engineer / Developer

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities: 
- Created and developed web pages for the banking sector (Davivienda, Banco Agrario, among others) using technologies such as JavaScript, React, TypeScript, Node JS, ExpressJS, HTML, CSS, Python, Flask, SQL, MongoDB, and AWS. 
- Led the development team, ensuring the creation and execution of schedules, training, and follow-up meetings under the SCRUM methodology. 
- Established database connections with cloud applications like AWS, ensuring process automation and monitoring. 

Achievements: 
- Built two web pages from scratch within a three-month period. 
- Optimized the delivery of debit cards, impacting over 20,000 users and reducing delivery time by 84%. 
- Led the company's first development team, consisting of three developers.
profile_positions.title: Software Engineer

company.name: Globant
company.description:
We are a digitally native company that helps organizations reinvent themselves to create a way forward and unleash their potential. We are the place where innovation, design and engineering meet scale.

- We have more than 27,000 employees and we are present in 25 countries working for companies like Google, Rockwell Automation, Electronic Arts and Santander, among others.

- We were also featured as a business case study at Harvard, MIT, and Stanford.

- We were named a Worldwide Leader in CX Improvement Services by IDC MarketScape report.

- We are a member of the Cybersecurity Tech Accord.

- At Globant, we believe that an inclusive culture and a diverse environment make us stronger. We are an equal opportunity employer (EOE M/F/D/V), always seeking to generate a place for inspiration and growth for everyone regardless of race, color, religion, national origin, sexual orientation, age, marital status, disability, gender identity, or veteran status.

- Our ultimate Diversity & Inclusion goal is to make Globant a respectful, safe, and inclusive workplace for all Globers where gender equality, cultural diversity, and inclusion are core to our DNA. 


For more information, visit https://bit.ly/globant_com
